mapper.select: select * from role r INNER JOIN user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = ur.user_id AND username = #{username}
select p.* from permission p INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id INNER JOIN role r ON rp.role_id = r.role_id AND role_flag = #{roleFlag} group by p.permission_id

SELECT p.* FROM permission p INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id AND p.`type`='00' AND p.object_parent=0 INNER JOIN role r ON r.role_id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN USER u ON u.user_id = ur.user_id AND u.username = #{username} group by p.object_id
